post.text: DNC Chair Donna Brazile is SO corrupt! SAD. She's just another arm of Crooked Hillary's RIGGED system -- coordinating with convicted criminals and paying people to start violence at my rallies! The system is UNBELIEVABLY RIGGED and believe me, as President, I will END the corruption and once again, your government will be by, for and of the people! #DrainTheSwamp  #RIGGED

comment.author: Katie
comment.text: Hillary scolded Mr Trump and said no one has challenged the election in 240 years.......Uh, Al Gore did it in 1999, and Bill Clinton told him to do it. Has she ever told the truth in her entire life !

replies.author: Edward
replies.text: You are so right Katie. The sad thing is the press even agrees with Hillary that an election has not been contested in 240 years. If you recall 1999 with Gore vs Bush the media covered this case. The media has chosen to conveniently forget.

replies.author: Katie
replies.text: There is so much corruption, that a lot of people have reached the point that they don't care anymore, and thus, let it go. I read that takes place in Countries where corruption and dictatorships took over. People get so tired of seeing it, listening to it, then as a defense mechanism, they ignore it. Might be a good idea to say to the people before the election that this is taking place and everyone must stand firm in the face of corruption, we must stand together or lose the Country as we know it. Have your speech writers come up with something glorious, it may put you over the top, a real serious speech about the hazards and emotions of corruption.

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: I just watched that section of tape.....she said no such thing. Quotes are only quotes if they are cited honestly.
